name: Flappy Bird! (ijh8kejrijwo)
description:
Instructions

Flappy Bird! Flap your wings to fly... [How to Play] >Press the Spacebar or Click to flap your wings and fly. >Avoid pipes. >Earn a medal: Bronze (10+), Silver (20+), Gold (30+), Platinum (40+). ONLY users with the "Scratcher" rank can be on the HS List! // Made on Scratch by HyperPixel!

Notes and Credits

Hey there, thanks for playing! This game is finalized and it's highly unlikely to be updated. I'm no longer an active user so I will not reply to most comments. Sorry for the inconvenience. Hope you enjoy my game, Happy Scratching! <-Comment your High Scores!-> Feel free to ★, ❤, and.. ┏━┓╋╋╋╋┏┓ ┏┓┓┓ ┃╋┣━┳━━╋╋┳┓┃┃┃┃ ┃┓┫┻┫┃┃┃┣┃┫┣┫┫┫ ┗┻┻━┻┻┻┻┻┻┛┗┛┛┛
